body: This highly volatile springal propels a group of black-powder rockets that rain down on the targeted square and in a 15-foot burst around the area. If the rocket springal misfires, it explodes, dealing its damage in a 20-foot blast around the springal. This explosion destroys the rocket springal. One use of rocket springal ammunition costs 500 gp and weighs 30 pounds.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Mastering Combat/Siege Engines/Siege Weapon Descriptions/Springal/Rocket
name: Rocket
